code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useLogout}from'../hooks/useLogout';import{useAuthContext}from'../hooks/useAuthContext';import'../styles/Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{logout}=useLogout();const{user}=useAuthContext();const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleClick=()=>{logout();navigate('/login');};const showMapView=location.pathname==='/home';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/home",className:"navbar__logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"TravelVibesPR"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar__nav",children:[user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar__user",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"navbar__user-email",children:user.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"navbar__logout-btn",onClick:handleClick,children:"Log out"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/select-vibes",className:"navbar__link",children:"Select Vibes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/add-experience",className:"navbar__link",children:"Add Experience"})]}),!user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar__guest",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"navbar__link",children:"Log In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",className:"navbar__link",children:"Sign Up"})]})]})]}),showMapView&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar__map-view",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/ExperienceMap",className:"navbar__map-link",children:"Map View"})})]});};export default Navbar;
